  • Method Details

    • collectContent

      public static String collectContent(InputBuffer buf)
      Collects the actual input text the input buffer provides into a String. This is especially useful for IndentDedentInputBuffers created by "transformIndents".
      Parameters:
      buf - the input buffer to collect from
      Returns:
      a string containing the content of the given input buffer
